bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of children producing much saliva, sleeping much, and being unable to consume breast milk. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 89: 治小兒脾風，多涎，心胸壅悶，不下乳食， 昏昏多睡，鉛霜散方 , “To cure children’s spleen wind with much saliva. The heart and chest are obstructed and feel heart-pressure. The children do not consume breast-milk. They are dizzy and sleep much. [Use] the recipe for the powder with qian shuang ”.
